post.body: I am responding to my own twitter. This is so meta.
Send us your questions for Scott Weiland before Thursday and we'll send you our love and gratitude! Offer not valid in Florida.
We just interviewed Eagles of Death Metal, Bayside, Hey Monday, and Tom Gabel, and learned that there's a mole in our midst. Exciting times!
Wayne Coyne = Coolest. Guest. Conceivable. Are we right, folks, or are we right?
P.S. We miss Naomi and Carrie!
Does anyone have any questions for Wayne Coyne? If so, email 'em to stevensuntitledrockshow@gmail.com! -Jonah
Steven is undergoing an elaborate surgical procedure to look and sound exactly like Matt Rubano. Tune in next week to see the results!
At last I have returned in all my glory! (I am watering Steven's Untitled Plant.) -Andrew the Intern... the PA
Don't forget to submit your questions for Rise Against! -Jonah
listening to I Am The Avalanche... :) - naomi
Please submit your Secondhand Serenade questions! -Jonah
steven is sleeping on the job.
I dub all of you Unforgiven... part 26. -Jonah
I hate the new Metallica record - Mike
loving all our friends on the surs myspace
Steven just got me to watch Larry the chicken get strapped to 90 balloons and float away. -Mike
Dillinger Four is god.
Steven is currently freezing stuff with that keyboard cleaner stuff. Luckily I sit ten feet away from him, so I think I'm safe. -Jonah
FARTFARTFARTFARTFARTFART -Steven
Does anyone have any questions for Innerparty System? If so, send 'em over! -Jonah
fuse cleaning day. not kidding. - naomi
We just got an email saying "Your Mom is now following you on Twitter..." so, there was totally no tongue and we'll be home by 10.
Rocking out to "24 Hour Revenge Therapy." It's one of those days. -Jonah
It's Steven and sadly it's true. The Untitled Rock Show is no more. It sucks but we had a great run. Thanks to all our fans. Love, Me
